name: Space Mission: Survival
description:
Space Mission: Survival is a retro arcade space shooter. You have 10 seconds of fuel in each level to destroy the aliens and keep your astronauts alive.

Keep yourself and the astronauts alive. Wave after wave of aliens will attack you will bullets and space mines. Pick up floating astronauts and return them to asteroids before you are destroyed or they float off into deep space.

Points are awarded for enemy hits, destroying mines, returning astronauts, and for not wasting fuel.

Leaderboards are shown in classic arcade attract-screen format. See your friends scores and play to be the best in the universe.

Achievements, Facebook and Twitter bragging also available in Space Mission: Survival.
